short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid Twitter shadowbans by preventing you from tweeting too quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spam is one of the main reasons people get shadowbanned. ShadowProof helps you space out your tweets so you can safely tweet without worrying about this factor of the shadowban.
